channel.description: https://www.redhat.com/en/blog/podman-clients-macos-windows Create connection between client and server Enable Podman service on the server: systemctl --user enable podman.socket Enable lingering for your user: sudo loginctl enable-linger $USER Make sure qemu-img is installed: sudo dnf install qemu-img sudo dnf -y install qemu-img.x86_64 Install gvproxy sudo dnf install -y podman-gvproxy Initialize and start a Podman machine: (this may take some time)
